description: Reports Mastodon version data and patch adoption

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) AS unique_domain_count
FROM mastodon_domains;
SELECT SUM(active_users_monthly) AS total_users FROM mastodon_domains;

panels.description: Count of distinct Mastodon versions, after various fork/meta identifiers are removed and nightly releases are normalized.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT software_version) AS unique_software_versions
FROM mastodon_domains;

panels.title: Versions

panels.description: Count of distinct Mastodon versions, before various fork/meta identifiers are removed and nightly releases are normalized.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT full_version) AS unique_software_versions
FROM mastodon_domains;

panels.title: Raw Versions

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT rd.domain) AS unique_domain_count
FROM raw_domains rd
WHERE rd.nodeinfo = 'mastodon'
  AND rd.reason LIKE 'HTTP%'
  AND EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM mastodon_domains md
    WHERE md.domain = rd.domain
  );

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT rd.domain) AS unique_domain_count
FROM raw_domains rd
WHERE rd.nodeinfo = 'mastodon'
  AND rd.reason ~ '^5[0-9]{2}'
  AND EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM mastodon_domains md
    WHERE md.domain = rd.domain
  );

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT rd.domain) AS unique_domain_count
FROM raw_domains rd
WHERE rd.nodeinfo = 'mastodon'
  AND rd.reason ~ '^4[0-9]{2}'
  AND EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM mastodon_domains md
    WHERE md.domain = rd.domain
  );

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT rd.domain) AS unique_domain_count
FROM raw_domains rd
WHERE rd.nodeinfo = 'mastodon'
  AND rd.reason LIKE 'SSL%'
  AND EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM mastodon_domains md
    WHERE md.domain = rd.domain
  );

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT rd.domain) AS unique_domain_count
FROM raw_domains rd
WHERE rd.nodeinfo = 'mastodon'
  AND rd.reason LIKE 'DNS%'
  AND EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM mastodon_domains md
    WHERE md.domain = rd.domain
  );

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) AS unique_domain_count
FROM raw_domains
WHERE nodeinfo = 'mastodon' AND reason LIKE 'MAU%'

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT rd.domain) AS unique_domain_count
FROM raw_domains rd
WHERE rd.nodeinfo = 'mastodon'
  AND (rd.reason LIKE 'FILE%' or rd.reason LIKE 'TYPE%' or rd.reason LIKE 'JSON%')
  AND EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM mastodon_domains md
    WHERE md.domain = rd.domain
  );

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) AS unique_domain_count
FROM raw_domains;

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) AS unique_domain_count
FROM raw_domains WHERE "nodeinfo"::TEXT NOT ILIKE '%mastodon%';

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) AS unique_domain_count
FROM raw_domains WHERE nxdomain

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) AS unique_domain_count
FROM raw_domains WHERE (ignore IS NOT NULL OR failed IS NOT NULL or norobots IS NOT NULL or baddata IS NOT NULL)

panels.description: Count of instances running latest patches for development branch (main), compared to the total instances on development branch.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) as "Main Patched"
FROM mastodon_domains 
WHERE software_version LIKE (
    SELECT software_version 
    FROM patch_versions 
    WHERE main = True
) || '%';

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) as "Main Total"
FROM mastodon_domains 
WHERE software_version LIKE (
    SELECT branch || '.%'
    FROM patch_versions 
    WHERE n_level = -1
);

panels.title: Patched Instances, Main

panels.description: Count of instances running latest patches for branch release-0 (latest), compared to the total instances on branch release-0.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) AS "Latest Patched"
FROM mastodon_domains
WHERE software_version =
(
    SELECT software_version
    FROM patch_versions
    WHERE n_level = 0
);

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) as "Latest Total"
FROM mastodon_domains 
WHERE software_version LIKE (
    SELECT branch || '.%'
    FROM patch_versions 
    WHERE n_level = 0
);

panels.title: Patched Instances, Latest

panels.description: Count of instances running latest patches for branch release-1 (previous), compared to the total instances on branch release-1.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) as "Latest Patched" 
FROM mastodon_domains md
WHERE md.software_version LIKE ANY (
    SELECT software_version || '%'
    FROM patch_versions 
    WHERE n_level = 1
);

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) as "Latest Total"
FROM mastodon_domains 
WHERE software_version LIKE (
    SELECT branch || '.%'
    FROM patch_versions 
    WHERE n_level = 1
);

panels.title: Patched Instances, Previous

panels.description: Count of instances running latest patches for branch release-2 (deprecated) or older, compared to the total instances on branch release-2 or older.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) as "Latest Patched" 
FROM mastodon_domains md
WHERE md.software_version LIKE ANY (
    SELECT software_version || '%'
    FROM patch_versions 
    WHERE n_level >= 2
);

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT domain) as "Latest Total"
FROM mastodon_domains 
WHERE software_version LIKE ANY (
    SELECT branch || '.%'
    FROM patch_versions 
    WHERE n_level >= 2
);

panels.title: Patched Instances, Deprecated

panels.description: Count of monthly active users (MAUs) on instances running latest patches for development branch (main), compared to the total instances on development branch.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT SUM(active_users_monthly) as updated_users
FROM mastodon_domains 
WHERE software_version LIKE ANY (
    SELECT software_version || '%'
    FROM patch_versions 
    WHERE n_level = -1
);

SELECT SUM(active_users_monthly) as "Main Total"
FROM mastodon_domains
WHERE software_version LIKE (
SELECT branch || '.%'
FROM patch_versions
WHERE n_level = -1
);

panels.title: Patched MAUs, Main

panels.description: Count of monthly active users (MAUs) on instances running latest patches for branch release-0 (latest), compared to the total instances on branch release-0.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT SUM(active_users_monthly) AS updated_users
FROM mastodon_domains
WHERE software_version =
(
    SELECT software_version
    FROM patch_versions
    WHERE n_level = 0
);

SELECT SUM(active_users_monthly) as "Main Total"
FROM mastodon_domains
WHERE software_version LIKE (
SELECT branch || '.%'
FROM patch_versions
WHERE n_level = 0
);

panels.title: Patched MAUs, Latest

panels.description: Count of monthly active users (MAUs) on instances running latest patches for branch release-1 (previous), compared to the MAUs on branch release-1.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT SUM(active_users_monthly) as updated_users
FROM mastodon_domains md
WHERE md.software_version LIKE ANY (
    SELECT software_version || '%'
    FROM patch_versions 
    WHERE n_level = 1
);

SELECT SUM(active_users_monthly) as "Main Total"
FROM mastodon_domains
WHERE software_version LIKE (
SELECT branch || '.%'
FROM patch_versions
WHERE n_level = 1
);

panels.title: Patched MAUs, Previous

panels.description: Count of monthly active users (MAUs) on  instances running latest patches for branch release-2 (deprecated) or older, compared to the MAUs on branch release-2 or older.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT SUM(active_users_monthly) as updated_users
FROM mastodon_domains md
WHERE md.software_version LIKE ANY (
    SELECT software_version || '%'
    FROM patch_versions 
    WHERE n_level >= 2
);

SELECT SUM(active_users_monthly) as "Main Total"
FROM mastodon_domains
WHERE software_version LIKE ANY (
SELECT branch || '.%'
FROM patch_versions
WHERE n_level >= 1
);

panels.title: Patched MAUs, Deprecated

targets.rawSql:
WITH version_cases AS (
  SELECT software_version
  FROM patch_versions
),
eol_check AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT software_version
  FROM mastodon_domains md
  WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 
    FROM eol_versions ev
    WHERE md.software_version LIKE ev.software_version || '.%'
       OR md.software_version LIKE ev.software_version || '%'
  )
)
SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM version_cases) THEN software_version
    WHEN software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM eol_check) THEN 'EOL'
    ELSE 'Unpatched'
  END as version,
  COUNT(*) as count
FROM mastodon_domains 
GROUP BY CASE 
    WHEN software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM version_cases) THEN software_version
    WHEN software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM eol_check) THEN 'EOL'
    ELSE 'Unpatched'
  END;

WITH version_cases AS (
  SELECT software_version
  FROM patch_versions
),
eol_check AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT software_version
  FROM mastodon_domains md
  WHERE EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 
    FROM eol_versions ev
    WHERE md.software_version LIKE ev.software_version || '.%'
       OR md.software_version LIKE ev.software_version || '%'
  )
)
SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM version_cases) THEN software_version
    WHEN software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM eol_check) THEN 'EOL'
    ELSE 'Unpatched'
  END as version,
  SUM(active_users_monthly) as user_count
FROM mastodon_domains 
GROUP BY CASE 
    WHEN software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM version_cases) THEN software_version
    WHEN software_version IN (SELECT software_version FROM eol_check) THEN 'EOL'
    ELSE 'Unpatched'
  END;

WITH prefixes AS (
    SELECT branch FROM patch_versions
),
matched AS (
    SELECT
        pv.branch AS prefix,
        COUNT(md.software_version) AS total
    FROM prefixes pv
    LEFT JOIN mastodon_domains md
      ON md.software_version LIKE pv.branch || '%'
    GROUP BY pv.branch
),
eol AS (
    SELECT
        'EOL' AS prefix,
        COUNT(*) AS total
    FROM mastodon_domains md
    WHERE NOT EXISTS (
        SELECT 1
        FROM prefixes p
        WHERE md.software_version LIKE p.branch || '%'
    )
)
SELECT * FROM matched
UNION ALL
SELECT * FROM eol
ORDER BY prefix;

WITH prefixes AS (
    SELECT branch FROM patch_versions
),
matched AS (
    SELECT
        pv.branch AS prefix,
        SUM(md.active_users_monthly) AS total_active_users
    FROM prefixes pv
    LEFT JOIN mastodon_domains md
      ON md.software_version LIKE pv.branch || '%'
    GROUP BY pv.branch
),
eol AS (
    SELECT
        'EOL' AS prefix,
        SUM(active_users_monthly) AS total_active_users
    FROM mastodon_domains md
    WHERE NOT EXISTS (
        SELECT 1
        FROM prefixes p
        WHERE md.software_version LIKE p.branch || '%'
    )
)
SELECT * FROM matched
UNION ALL
SELECT * FROM eol
ORDER BY prefix;

WITH prefixes AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT software_version AS prefix
  FROM eol_versions
  WHERE software_version IS NOT NULL
    AND software_version <> ''
    AND software_version NOT LIKE '1%'
    AND software_version NOT LIKE '2%'
),
matched AS (
  SELECT
    p.prefix,
    COUNT(md.software_version) AS total
  FROM prefixes p
  LEFT JOIN mastodon_domains md
    ON md.software_version LIKE p.prefix || '%'
  GROUP BY p.prefix
)
SELECT prefix, total
FROM matched
ORDER BY prefix;

WITH prefixes AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT software_version AS prefix
  FROM eol_versions
  WHERE software_version IS NOT NULL
    AND software_version <> ''
    AND software_version NOT LIKE '1%'
    AND software_version NOT LIKE '2%'
),
matched AS (
  SELECT
    p.prefix,
    COALESCE(SUM(md.active_users_monthly), 0) AS total_active_users
  FROM prefixes p
  LEFT JOIN mastodon_domains md
    ON md.software_version LIKE p.prefix || '%'
  GROUP BY p.prefix
)
SELECT prefix, total_active_users
FROM matched
ORDER BY prefix;

SELECT
  statistics.date AS time,
  statistics.main_instances AS "Main Branch",
  statistics.latest_instances AS "Latest Branch",
  statistics.previous_instances AS "Previous Branch",
  statistics.deprecated_instances AS "Deprecated Branch",
  statistics.eol_instances AS "EOL Branches"
FROM
  statistics
ORDER BY
  statistics.date DESC
LIMIT 7;

SELECT
  statistics.date AS time,
  statistics.main_branch_mau AS "Main Branch",
  statistics.latest_branch_mau AS "Latest Branch",
  statistics.previous_branch_mau AS "Previous Branch",
  statistics.deprecated_branch_mau AS "Deprecated Branch",
  statistics.eol_branch_mau AS "EOL Branches"
FROM
  statistics
ORDER BY
  statistics.date DESC
LIMIT 7;

SELECT
  statistics.date AS time,
  statistics.main_patched_instances AS "Main Branch",
  statistics.latest_patched_instances AS "Latest Branch",
  statistics.previous_patched_instances AS "Previous Branch",
  statistics.deprecated_patched_instances AS "Deprecated Branch"
FROM
  statistics
ORDER BY
  statistics.date DESC
LIMIT 7;

SELECT
  statistics.date AS time,
  statistics.main_patched_mau AS "Main Branch",
  statistics.latest_patched_mau AS "Latest Branch",
  statistics.previous_patched_mau AS "Previous Branch",
  statistics.deprecated_patched_mau AS "Deprecated Branch"
FROM
  statistics
ORDER BY
  statistics.date DESC
LIMIT 7;

SELECT 
    COUNT(CASE WHEN 
        software_version LIKE '5.0%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.9%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.8%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.7%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.6%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.5%'
    THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*) AS "4.5+",

    COUNT(CASE WHEN 
        software_version LIKE '5.0%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.9%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.8%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.7%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.6%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.5%' OR 
        software_version LIKE '4.4%' 
    THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*) AS "4.4+",

    COUNT(CASE WHEN 
        software_version LIKE '5.0%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.9%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.8%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.7%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.6%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.5%' OR 
        software_version LIKE '4.4%' OR 
        software_version LIKE '4.3%'
    THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*) AS "4.3+",

    COUNT(CASE WHEN 
        software_version LIKE '4.6%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.5%' OR 
        software_version LIKE '4.4%' OR 
        software_version LIKE '4.3%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.2%'
    THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*) AS "4.2+",

    COUNT(CASE WHEN 
        software_version LIKE '5.0%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.9%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.8%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.7%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.6%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.5%' OR 
        software_version LIKE '4.4%' OR 
        software_version LIKE '4.3%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.2%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.1%'
    THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*) AS "4.1+",

    COUNT(CASE WHEN 
        software_version LIKE '5.0%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.9%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.8%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.7%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.6%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.5%' OR 
        software_version LIKE '4.4%' OR 
        software_version LIKE '4.3%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.2%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.1%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.0%'
    THEN 1 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*) AS "4.0+"

FROM 
    mastodon_domains
WHERE 
    software_version IS NOT NULL;

SELECT 
    SUM(CASE WHEN 
        software_version LIKE '5.0%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.9%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.8%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.7%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.6%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.5%' 
    THEN active_users_monthly ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / 
        SUM(active_users_monthly) AS "4.5+",

    SUM(CASE WHEN 
        software_version LIKE '4.6%' OR 
        software_version LIKE '4.5%' OR 
        software_version LIKE '4.4%' 
    THEN active_users_monthly ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / 
        SUM(active_users_monthly) AS "4.4+",

    SUM(CASE WHEN
        software_version LIKE '5.0%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.9%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.8%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.7%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.6%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.5%' OR 
        software_version LIKE '4.4%' OR 
        software_version LIKE '4.3%'
    THEN active_users_monthly ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / 
        SUM(active_users_monthly) AS "4.3+",

    SUM(CASE WHEN 
        software_version LIKE '5.0%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.9%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.8%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.7%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.6%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.5%' OR 
        software_version LIKE '4.4%' OR 
        software_version LIKE '4.3%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.2%'
    THEN active_users_monthly ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / 
        SUM(active_users_monthly) AS "4.2+",

    SUM(CASE WHEN 
        software_version LIKE '5.0%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.9%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.8%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.7%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.6%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.5%' OR 
        software_version LIKE '4.4%' OR 
        software_version LIKE '4.3%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.2%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.1%'
    THEN active_users_monthly ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / 
        SUM(active_users_monthly) AS "4.1+",

    SUM(CASE WHEN 
        software_version LIKE '5.0%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.9%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.8%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.7%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.6%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.5%' OR 
        software_version LIKE '4.4%' OR 
        software_version LIKE '4.3%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.2%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.1%' OR
        software_version LIKE '4.0%'
    THEN active_users_monthly ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / 
        SUM(active_users_monthly) AS "4.0+"
FROM 
    mastodon_domains
WHERE 
    software_version IS NOT NULL
    AND active_users_monthly IS NOT NULL;

SELECT 
    software_version AS "Software Version",
    COUNT(*) AS "Instances"
FROM mastodon_domains
GROUP BY software_version
ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT 
    software_version AS "Software Version",
    SUM(active_users_monthly) AS "Monthly Active Users"
FROM mastodon_domains
GROUP BY software_version
ORDER BY SUM(active_users_monthly) DESC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT 
    domain AS "Domain",
    software_version AS "Version",
    active_users_monthly AS "MAU"
FROM mastodon_domains 
WHERE software_version NOT IN (
    SELECT software_version 
    FROM patch_versions
)
AND NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM eol_versions
    WHERE mastodon_domains.software_version LIKE eol_versions.software_version || '%'
)
ORDER BY active_users_monthly DESC
LIMIT 100;

SELECT 
    domain AS "Domain",
    software_version AS "Version",
    active_users_monthly AS "MAU"
FROM mastodon_domains 
WHERE software_version NOT IN (
    SELECT software_version 
    FROM patch_versions
)
AND EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM eol_versions
    WHERE mastodon_domains.software_version LIKE eol_versions.software_version || '%'
)
ORDER BY active_users_monthly DESC
LIMIT 100;

SELECT 
    domain AS "Domain",
    software_version AS "Version",
    full_version as "Raw Version",
    active_users_monthly as "Monthly Active Users",
    timestamp as "Last Crawled"
FROM mastodon_domains
ORDER BY timestamp DESC
LIMIT 10;

SELECT 
    domain AS "Domain",
    software_version AS "Version",
    full_version as "Raw Version",
    active_users_monthly as "Monthly Active Users",
    timestamp as "Last Crawled"
FROM mastodon_domains
ORDER BY active_users_monthly DESC;

title: vmcrawl
